data.text:
Spa was very good with Indra and Sari. Very good massage treatment and kind staff. Definitely coming again some time soon! 

The staff treat you well and always are smiling. The massage itself was great and they have some amazing tea afterwards. Definitely recommend!
data.title: Great massage & Kind Staff

data.text: Not usually one to write reviews but wanted to share Another lovely stay at the Address beach resort, staff as ever always go out of the way to help and make your stay good, a special mention for Beth at breakfast  for exceptional service and always starting the day with a big smile.
data.title: Lovely stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear SarahhC9088CH,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent stay at Address Beach Resort. We greatly appreciate your kind words and are thrilled to hear that you had another enjoyable experience with us.

It warms our hearts to know that our staff consistently go out of their way to ensure that your stay is nothing short of excellent. Providing exceptional service and ensuring our guests feel welcomed and well taken care of is of utmost importance to us. We will be sure to pass along your appreciation to our team, including Beth, for her exceptional service at breakfast. Starting the day with a smile is indeed a wonderful way to set a positive tone, and we are delighted that Beth's warm hospitality made a difference in your experience.

Your feedback serves as a great encouragement for us to continue striving for excellence in everything we do. We are committed to providing memorable stays for all our guests, and we are thrilled that we were able to achieve this during your visit.

Once again, thank you for choosing Address Beach Resort. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the near future. If there is anything we can do to enhance your next visit, please do not hesitate to let us know.

Warm regards,

Management Office
Address Beach Resort
owner_response.author: Management Office

data.text: Firstly, I must commend your team for the exceptional service they provided throughout our visit. From the warm welcome at the entrance to the attentive servers who ensured that our needs were met promptly, every aspect of the service was top-notch.Regarding the food, I must say that I was thoroughly impressed. The menu offered a delightful range of options, and each dish we ordered was prepared to perfection. The flavors were exquisite, and the presentation added to the overall dining experience.Moreover, the ambiance of the restaurant was lovely, contributing to a relaxing and enjoyable evening. The attention to detail in the decor and the overall atmosphere created a memorable dining environment.Overall, my experience at the Restaurant exceptional, and I look forward to returning in the future. Please extend my compliments to your team for their outstanding work.Thank you once again for a wonderful dining experience.
data.title: Very satisfied

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear B9071WEmohammeda,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent dining experience at our restaurant. We are delighted to hear that you had such a positive impression and that our team was able to exceed your expectations.

Your commendation of our team's exceptional service from the warm welcome at the entrance to the attentive servers truly warms our hearts. Providing top-notch service is a priority for us, and we are thrilled that every aspect of your visit reflected this dedication to excellence.

We are equally pleased that you enjoyed the culinary offerings at our restaurant. It brings us joy to know that the menu provided a delightful range of options and that each dish was prepared to perfection, leaving you thoroughly impressed. Our chefs take great pride in crafting dishes with exquisite flavors, and it is rewarding to hear that you found them to be so.

Additionally, we appreciate your kind words regarding the ambiance of the restaurant. Creating a relaxing and enjoyable atmosphere is essential for us, and we are glad that the attention to detail in the decor contributed to a memorable dining environment for you.

Your feedback serves as a great motivation for our team to continue delivering exceptional dining experiences for all our guests. We will certainly pass along your compliments to our team members for their outstanding work.

Once again, thank you for choosing Address Beach Resort for your dining experience. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future and providing you with another memorable visit.

If there is anything further we can assist you with or if you have any special requests for your next visit, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Warm regards,

Management Office
Address Beach Resort
owner_response.author: Management Office

data.text: Staying here for 3 years in services apartments, really good service standards and helpful staff at reception. Nice facilities and good food.  Always nice to be back and feel like home with the exceptional, personalized and professional help from all staff.
data.title: Good place to live in

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 478alexandrp,

We are truly grateful for your continued loyalty and for choosing to make Address Beach Resort your home away from home for the past three years. Your feedback regarding your experience staying in our serviced apartments means the world to us.

It fills us with pride to hear that you have consistently found our service standards to be of high quality and that our reception staff have been helpful throughout your stay. Providing exceptional service and ensuring our guests feel welcomed and cared for is at the core of what we do, and we are delighted that you have experienced this firsthand.

We are also thrilled that you have enjoyed our facilities and the culinary offerings at our resort. Creating a comfortable and enjoyable environment for our guests is paramount, and we are pleased that we have been able to meet your expectations in this regard.

Your kind words regarding the exceptional, personalized, and professional assistance provided by all our staff are deeply appreciated. We are fortunate to have a dedicated team who are committed to making every guest feel valued and well looked after.

Thank you once again for your valuable feedback and for allowing us the opportunity to be a part of your journey over the past three years. We look forward to many more years of welcoming you back and ensuring that each visit feels like coming home.

If there is anything we can do to enhance your future stays or if you have any additional feedback to share, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Warmest regards,

Management Office
Address Beach Resort
owner_response.author: Management Office

data.text: Great service at the restaurant brunch buffet.  The entire staff seem to have been trained really well on customer service. Our experience was with John and Bruce and they were both very friendly and accommodating. Food selection is good as well l but what impressed us the most was the service!!! Keep it up.
data.title: Great customer service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Go7682865,

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our restaurant brunch buffet. We are thrilled to hear that you had such a positive impression of our service, particularly with John and Bruce.

At Address Beach Resort, we take great pride in ensuring that our staff are well-trained in providing exceptional customer service, and it brings us immense joy to know that this was reflected in your experience. We will certainly pass along your kind words to John, Bruce, and the rest of our team.

Moreover, we are delighted that you found our food selection to your liking. We strive to offer a diverse array of options to cater to the varied tastes of our guests.

Your feedback serves as a great motivation for us to continue delivering memorable experiences for all our guests. We are committed to maintaining the high standards of service that you experienced and look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable visit.

Once again, thank you for choosing Address Beach Resort. If there is anything further we can assist you with, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Warm regards,

Management Office
Address Beach Resort
owner_response.author: Management Office
